title: Luxury House for sale in Nugegoda
details:
Almost Brand New House, Designed by renowned Architect.

*20m from Stanley Thilakarathne Mawatha and Jubilee Post Junction.
* 4 Rooms ( 2 XL Master Bed rooms) ( 2 Large Bed Rooms )All rooms Fully Air Conditioned( Pansonic Inverter Type AC )
* Separate Audio Visual Room Fully Air Conditioned( Pansonic Inverter Type AC )
* Upstairs and stairway Including audio visual room fitted with original kabuk and teak flooring.

Pantry
* world renowned SMEG Appliances and pantary fittings with dining Island.
* Separate Large Curry Kitchen with teak fittings.

Maids & Drivers

*Separate Maids room and maids wash room inside.
*Separate Maids wash room Outside.
*Separate Maids Entrance

Parking.
* Two Roller Shutters at each end of the house with parking for 4 vehicles.

Other
Fully Fitted French Windows around the house
massive Parapet wall securing the premises
